title: I found an old tombstone in my back yard.It is for Mary Burton Wilson born August 1873 died january 4th 1933.Was married to William M Wilson.I wonder if she is buried here or if vandals discarded the stone years ago.I have lived in this location 25 years.
text:
I'm forwarding your question and contact information to Features
Editor John Staton for consideration as a possible story.
